name: A. Escape from Stones
statement:
Squirrel Liss lived in a forest peacefully, but unexpected trouble
happens. Stones fall from a mountain. Initially Squirrel Liss occupies
an interval . Next, stones will fall and Liss will escape from the
stones. The stones are numbered from 1 to in order.The stones always
fall to the center of Liss’s interval. When Liss occupies the interval
and a stone falls to , she will escape to the left or to the right. If
she escapes to the left, her new interval will be . If she escapes to
the right, her new interval will be .You are given a string of length .
If the -th character of is "" or "", when the -th stone falls Liss will
escape to the left or to the right, respectively. Find the sequence of
stones’ numbers from left to right after all the stones falls.
